name: Totemsito
description:
Someone keeps unplugging all of our robots! Match their totems with their guides so they can function again!

This is a puzzleish game where your main goal is to accumulate as much rebooted robots as possible. 

This is a game entry for the 2020 Campus Game Jam. We followed the reboot the world theme.

Credits:

Music by https://www.purple-planet.com

Swoosh sound by https://soundslikegeorge.itch.io/human-interface

Birthday party sound from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/cat/party-355/

Robot Kyle by Unity Technologies 

Game design, art creation, programming and implementation made by Cuadot and luisquid.

Some of the sounds were made by luisquid.
